【！】 端末の電源が切れた状態ではSuicaをご利用いただけません

MoneyNote is a simple household account book app.
When you enter expense or income on the easy-to-see input screen, it automatically creates calendars and reports. It is easy to grasp the household's expense management.

--------------------
▼ Features
--------------------

1. Simple and Easy!
2. No registration
3. All functions without In-App-purchase
4. You can also enter from the calendar
5. Month / Year / Cumulative report included
6. You can create your own categories
7. Setting fixed income and expense
8. Themed color of 20 colors and 25 app icons
9. Supports backup & CSV output
10. Passcode lock (also Face ID & Touch ID)

--------------------
▼ Explanation of each function
--------------------

◆ Input
Tap the category button easy to push and enter the amount of money.
The keyboard has a nice calculator.
It is easy to see with a large number, easy to use button easy to push.
There is also a convenient automatic input mode so that you can input consecutive receipts collectively and continuously.


◆ Calendar
You can easily comprehend the income and expenditure situation on the calendar.
You can also start from the payday because you can change the start day of the week and the beginning and closing dates of the month.
Since you can also input and delete from the calendar, you can also enter receipt etc. together at once.
Since savings and initial balance can be set, carry forward display and cumulative asset and monetary amount can be displayed.


◆ Report
We can chart the monthly income and expenditure as a pie chart and grasp the balance of income and expenditure.
Because you can check the proportion of expenditure and each data for each category, you can see unnecessary expenses or household waste if it is surprising.


◆ Backup · CSV output
The input data can be output as CSV Excel data.
Since this data can also be saved as a backup, you can use the household account book as it is by loading even a new terminal when changing the model of iPhone or iPad.
Also, you can also use the output CSV data on a personal computer, so you can set the category as an account item and use it for final return declaration · blue · white declaration.


◆ Theme color
You can change the theme color of the application.
You can customize it according to your favorite color such as cute pink or chic dark blue.
You can also change the icon of the application according to the theme color.
You can change the theme color to be changed to 20 colors or more, and the icon to 20 designs or more.


◆ Passcode lock
By setting the secret code number, you can lock the browsing of important household account books.
It also supports the latest features of iPhone X such as Touch ID and Face ID.
Of course, these functions can be used for free in other applications as well.



A simple housekeeping book application MoneyNote is a simple new standard household account book made so that anyone can use it. Unlike complicated applications that carry many popular functions, such as receipt shooting and reading every time, it is a provision made easy to understand so that anyone can use the minimum necessary convenience functions. ※ LG유플러스 법인명의 휴대폰 및 알뜰폰(MVNO)에서도 이용 가능합니다. 단, 알뜰폰(법인)에서는 이용 불가합니다.
※ 만 14세 미만은 보호자(법정대리인) 동의 후 서비스 이용이 가능합니다.

[주요 기능]
- 간편본인확인: PASS앱을 통해 비밀번호, 생체인증(지문/얼굴) 등 다양한 인증방식을 제공
- 일반본인확인: 기존 SMS로 본인확인 인증
- 최근 인증 내역 확인 및 조회
- 모바일신분증 : 운전면허증과 주민등록증을 PASS에 등록하여, 실물 신분증과 동일한 법적 효력을 가지고 편리하게 사용할 수 있습니다.
- PASS 인증서 : 각종 금융, 공공업무 인증 및 로그인, 전자서명 제공
- 전자문서 : 공공기관 증명서 발급, 열람, 제출 서비스 제공
- 자산조회 및 추천 : 흩어져 있는 내 자산조회 및 나에게 맞는 금융상품 추천
- 휴대폰결제 : 휴대폰결제 이용내역, 한도 조회 및 변경 

- 다양한 부가 서비스 : 신용관리부터 내 정보, 건강, 피싱 보호 등의 부가 서비스 제공
- 금융, 건강, 정보, 피싱 보호 등 실생활에 유용한 정보와 혜택을 제공하는 다양한 서비스 제공

[이용안내]
- PASS 서비스는 LG유플러스에서 제공하는 무료 서비스입니다.
- 회원가입 : 앱 설치 후, 본인확인 완료 시 PASS 앱에서 사용할 비밀번호 혹은 생체인증 정보를 등록하시면 서비스 가입이 완료됩니다.
- 간편본인확인 : PASS 앱을 통해 인증 완료 하시면 간편본인확인이 완료됩니다. 앱 알림을 ON으로 설정해 두시면 더욱 빠르게 이용하실 수 있습니다. (앱 삭제 후 인증 시도 시 알림 불가)
- 모바일운전면허증 확인 : 운전면허증을 PASS 앱에 등록하여 온/오프라인에서 안전하게 사용하실 수 있습니다. 특히 오프라인에서는 모바일 운전면허증 화면 내 QR코드/바코드를 요청한 기관/검증자가 해당 코드를 읽으면 확인이 완료됩니다.
- 주민등록증 모바일 확인 : 실물 주민등록증 없이도 주민등록증에 수록된 정보를 PASS 앱에 등록하여 성인여부, 신원확인이 가능합니다. 오프라인에서 기관/검증자가 QR코드를 읽으면 진위 확인이 완료됩니다.
- PASS인증서 : 본인확인 및 본인 명의의 계좌인증 완료 후 인증서를 발급받아 사용하실 수 있습니다. 발급한 인증서는 3년 동안 이용 가능합니다.

[유의사항]
- 비밀번호 인증수단: iOS 10 이상의 모든 단말에서 이용 가능 하며, 지문인증 수단과 얼굴인증 수단의 경우 TouchID 와 FaceID 탑재 단말에서 이용 가능 합니다.
- 3G/LTE/로밍 이용 시 요금제에 따른 데이터 통화료가 부가될 수 있습니다.
- 타 통신사 출시 단말은 서비스 이용이 제한될 수 있습니다.
- 휴대폰 사용환경을 임의로 변경할 경우(루팅, 해킹 및 기타), PASS 서비스는 동작하지 않을 수 있습니다.
- 앱 비밀번호는 개인정보보호를 위해 별도로 저장을 하지 않사오니 비밀번호를 분실하지 않도록 유의하세요!
- 서비스 이용 문의: 휴대폰 114/ 이메일: lguplus.smartotp@gmail.com

[선택적 접근 권한]
- 카메라 권한 : QR코드로 인증, 운전면허증 촬영 시 사용됩니다.
- 위치정보 권한 : 금융기관, 공공기관 등에 모바일 운전면허 확인증 제출(전송) 시 기기의 위치 확인을 위해 사용됩니다.
- 바이오 정보 권한 : 본인확인을 위해 지문/Face ID 인증 시 사용됩니다.
- 사진 권한 : 이미지 또는 사진 첨부 시 사용됩니다.

summary.label:
The Debt Payoff Planner app is the simplest way to stop feeling overwhelmed and start having a specific, step-by-step plan for paying off your loans.

Today is the day to make a plan with a loan calculator and beginning paying down debt. Required inputs for calculating your debt free date are the current balance of the loan, the annual percentage rate (APR), and the minimum payment amount. That's the only requirement to getting a customized debt repayment schedule.

Easy steps to becoming debt free:

   - Enter your loans and debts
   - Enter your additional monthly payment budget to pay down faster
   - Choose a debt payoff strategy
      * Dave Ramsey's Debt Snowball (lowest balance first)
      * Debt Avalanche (highest rate first)
      * Debt Snowflake (one-time extra payment toward loans)
      * Custom debt free payoff plan

Debt Payoff Planner and Loan Calculator determines the optimum payment plan and how long it will take until you will be debt free. You tell the app how much you want to budget toward paying off your debt and we'll tell you how.  We recommend the Debt Snowball strategy because we believe that paying off individual accounts faster will help you stay focused on your financial goal of debt elimination. A payoff plan is only useful if you stick with it!

Your ability and willingness to pay more than the minimum payments is how you will become debt free in less time than you imagined. Budgeting your income will help you to get a regular monthly amount to pay down the debt faster. The payoff chart will show two payoff scenarios: only paying the minimum amounts, and the repayment schedule when you pay more the the minimum ever month.

Creating an account enables you to have a secure backup and your information is immediately available if you start using a new device.  Getting out of debt is hard, so we try to allow you to take baby steps toward this goal.

We believe that becoming debt free requires an easy starting point and making sure every dollar is leveraged perfectly. The loan calculator has minimal inputs in order to make your money management easy to follow.

The Debt Payoff Planner and Calculator is also used for tracking payments and updating the time-frame for becoming debt-free. Inputting payment information is as simple as typing in the amount and the date the payment was made. The goal of payment tracking is to see your progress over time and affirm that you are staying focused on your financial goals.

In addition to being a debt tracker and loan calculator, we are also trying to help point out some possible next steps with articles focused on how to pay off student loans, auto loans, and credit cards faster.  Also, there is some tips on credit card balance transfers as well as strategies for debt consolidation.

We support eight loan categories:
   * Credit Cards like Capital One, Citicard, Chase, etc.
   * Student Loans like Navient, Sallie Mae, Great Lakes, etc.
   * Auto/Car Loans
   * Medical Loans
   * Mortgages like Rocket Mortgage, SoFi, etc.
   * Personal Loans to friends and family or other individuals
   * Taxes like IRS or local municipalities
   * Other category could be anything from a paycheck loan to a hard money loan

In addition to the Debt Snowball calculator and the Debt Avalanche method, many users like to do a custom sorting of their debts.  This customization is available for users that want to be their own debt manager.

We allow the ability to provide a Debt Snowflake payoff as well.  A Debt Snowflake is a one-time payment from things like a bonus at work, a tax refund, an extra payday, etc.  This additional capability allows you to have tighter control over every dollar you are budgeting.
